children.text:
#1. Where can I find new comics? 
You can find new comics on Internet websites like Image Comics, The Private Eye or searching CBR or CBZ comics using Google.

Copy them into the SD memory of your device and add them to Comic Time. You can also open them from the web browser or from the file manager. 

#2. Why sometimes do I only see the full page instead of moving through the panels? 
Sometimes Comic Time is not able to detect panels in pages and only shows the full page.

In these cases you can manually select a panel with Long press drag gesture: Make a long press in a panel corner and, after the vibration, drag to the opossite corner and lift 

#3. Why sometimes do I see incomplete panels or strange images? 
Sometimes Comic Time is not able to detect propertly panels in pages.

In these cases you can change to full page view using the button ￼ in the upper left corner and manually select a panel with Long press drag gesture: Make a long press in a panel corner and, after the vibration, drag to the opossite corner and lift 

#4. How can I organize my library? 
When you add a comic, it is added to a folder with the same name that the source folder. If you tap and hold over a comic you can rename, move or delete it. You can directly rename a comic or folder if you tap and hold over its name. 

#5. What is Movie mode? 
It is a panel-by-panel guided view style that shows each panel individually with transitions between them. 


If you have other problems, doubts or suggestion you can contact us pressing button ￼ in the upper bar or by: 
- Email: dexxsolutions@gmail.com 
- Facebook: ComicTimeDexxSolutions 
- Twitter: @DexxSolutions
